name: Dog Simulator. Best Puppy Evolution Simulation For Kids
name_original: Dog Simulator. Best Puppy Evolution Simulation For Kids
description:
Dog Simulator is a battle for survival. Play as a real dog and explore huge places and awesome gardens when you run into it.
Pick your favorite breed and live the life of a stray dog! Survive in a massive city filled with dangerous dogs. Two modes of gameplay with 20 challenging time chasing levels. Accomplish the task before the time elapse and destroy as many objects and do as many interactions as fast as possible. There are some hidden challenges available inside this game so be smart to find them and complete the challenging task. You can even go out in the city and play around. There are many targets in this urban environment.

In Dog Simulator attack as many things as possible to rack up the points and meat your goals. Get ready for some real adventures. Pick up things, search various stuff and find your way to complete your objectives. Dog Simulator game features interactive sounds and fun game play makes this even more interesting to play. The better you perform the more you earn points. This game is designed with great graphics, challenging game modes. Great and stylish graphics, perfect physics. This game is going to be a joyful fun for you. This animal simulator has been designed for all ages.

Start this ultimate game of survival now!

Dog Simulator Key Features:

* Your dog is free to roam in massive open-world busy city streets, wide-open parks, white-fenced neighborhoods and village environments!
* You need to maintain your health, hunger, thirst, and energy if want to survive the harsh life of a wild dog in the streets!
* Dynamic weather systems with unique storms, clouds, and celestial movement. Realistic storms will bring a downpour of rain!
* Upgrade your Dogs Strength, Stamina, and Speed!
* Use your powerful bite to defend your territory and fight your enemies!
* Different Dog Breeds with rich Game play Missions!
* Real-time Physics with smooth and habitual touch controls!
* Stunning high quality 3D graphics!
* Invariable and optimized performance!
* Fascinating background music!
* Realistic Simulation engine.

** Download Dog Simulator to experience the exciting life of a stray dog surviving on the streets!

How to Play:-
* Use the joystick to move around the game
* Tap right button to jump
